metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12515 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the function FlateStream::getChar() located at Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.01.01. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure or a denial of service.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> can't reproduce with poppler, no indication it is affected ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore.

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
